description.brazilian: Concluir a escrita de um total de 25 livros. Você também pode publicá-los para ganhar um dinheiro extra!
description.czech: Napiš 25 knih. Můžeš je taky zkusit vydat a vydělat na nich!
description.dutch: Schrijf in totaal 25 boeken. Je kunt ze ook publiceren om wat extra geld te verdienen!
description.english: Finish writing a total of 25 books. You can also publish them to get some extra money!
description.french: Écrivez un total de 25 livres. Vous pouvez également les publier pour gagner de l’argent supplémentaire !
description.german: Schreib insgesamt 25 Bücher. Du kannst sie zusätzlich veröffentlichen, um etwas extra Geld zu verdienen!
description.italian: Scrivi un totale di 25 libri. Puoi anche pubblicarli per ottenere qualche guadagno extra!
description.japanese: 合計25冊の本を書き終える。出版してお金を稼ぐこともできます！
description.polish: Napisz 25 książek. Możesz też je opublikować, by zarobić trochę pieniędzy!
description.romanian: Finish writing a total of 25 books. You can also publish them to get some extra money!
description.schinese: 总计创作25部书。你可以出版它们来赚取额外的收入！
description.spanish: Termina de escribir un total de 25 libros. ¡También puedes publicarlos para conseguir algo de dinero extra!
description.tchinese: Finish writing a total of 25 books. You can also publish them to get some extra money!
description.turkish: Toplam 25 kitap yaz. Ayrıca, ek gelir elde etmek için yazdığın kitapları yayınlayabilirsin!

displayName.romanian: Are We Out of the Woods Yet
displayName.tchinese: Are We Out of the Woods Yet

description.brazilian: Crie todos os itens de marcenaria pelo menos uma vez.
description.dutch: Maak elk houtwerk tenminste een keer.
description.english: Create every woodworking item at least once.
description.french: Fabriquez chaque élément de menuiserie au moins une fois.
description.german: Erstelle jedes Holzwerk mindestens ein mal.
description.italian: Realizza ogni articolo di falegnameria almeno una volta.
description.japanese: すべての木工アイテムを1回以上作る
description.polish: Stwórz każdy przedmiot na stole stolarskim przynajmniej raz.
description.romanian: Create every woodworking item at least once.
description.schinese: 所有木艺制品至少生产一个。
description.spanish: Crea todos los objetos de carpintería al menos una vez.
description.tchinese: Create every woodworking item at least once.
description.turkish: Her ahşap ürününü en az bir kez yap.

displayName.english: Fresh Frozen Out of The Can
displayName.french: Un·e vrai·e cordon-bleu qui n’y va pas avec le dos de la cuillère !
displayName.spanish: Congelados recién sacados de la lata

description.brazilian: Crie todos os itens alimentares pelo menos uma vez, incluindo alimentos grelhados, alimentos criados por crianças e alimentos exclusivos para idosos.
description.czech: Připrav alespoň jednou každý pokrm. Počítají se i grilovaná jídla a jídla, která mohou připravovat děti.
description.dutch: Bereid elke gerecht tenminste één keer, inclusief gebarbecued eten en eten gemaakt door kinderen.
description.english: Create every food item at least once, including barbecued food and food created by children.
description.french: Cuisinez tous les plats au moins une fois, y compris les grillades et les aliments créés par les enfants.
description.german: Koche oder grille jedes Lebensmittel mindestens einmal. Das beinhaltet auch Essen, das von Kindern gekocht werden kann, und besondere Mahlzeiten von Senior:innen.
description.italian: Prepara ogni alimento almeno una volta, compreso il cibo cotto al barbecue, quello preparato dai bambini, e quello riservato agli anziani.
description.japanese: バーベキュー料理や子供が作る料理、シニア用の料理などを含む、すべての料理アイテムを1回以上作る
description.polish: Ugotuj wszystkie dania przynajmniej raz, włączając też grillowane jedzenie i jedzenie stworzone przez dzieci.
description.romanian: Create every food item at least once, including barbecued food and food created by children.
description.schinese: 所有类型食品至少生产出一个，包括烧烤菜肴和儿童制菜品。
description.spanish: Crea cada alimento al menos una vez, incluidos alimentos asados, alimentos creados por niños y alimentos exclusivos para ancianos.
description.tchinese: Create every food item at least once, including barbecued food and food created by children.
description.turkish: Her yemek ürününü bir kez bile olsa yap, çocukların yaptığı ve barbekü dahil.

displayName.french: L’art du chevalet et la maîtrise du pinceau
displayName.italian: Ne hai fatte di tutti i colori

description.brazilian: Crie todos os tipos de pintura pelo menos uma vez.

description.english: Create every painting type at least once.
description.french: Créez chaque peinture au moins une fois.
description.german: Male jedes Gemälde mindestens ein mal.
description.italian: Realizza ogni tipo di dipinto almeno una volta.
description.japanese: すべての絵画の種類を1回以上描く
description.polish: Stwórz każdy typ obrazu przynajmniej raz
description.romanian: Create every painting type at least once.
description.schinese: 所有类型绘画作品至少创作一张。
description.spanish: Crea cada tipo pintura al menos una vez.
description.tchinese: Create every painting type at least once.
description.turkish: Her çeşit sanat eserinden en az bir tane yap.

description.brazilian: Veja como um pequenino que está visitando a sua casa, morre nela.
description.czech: Na tvém pozemku zemřel cizí Tiny.
description.dutch: Watch as a Tiny who is visiting your home lot dies on it.
description.english: Watch as a Tiny who is visiting your home lot dies on it.
description.french: Un·e Tiny visiteur·euse est mort·e sur votre propriété.
description.german: Sieh zu, wie ein:e dich besuchende:r Tiny auf deinem Heimatgrundstück stirbt.
description.italian: Osserva un* Tiny morire sul tuo lotto mentre è in visita.
description.japanese: 自分の家の区画を訪れていたタイニーがそこで死ぬのを見届ける
description.polish: Zobacz jak Tiny odwiedzający twoją parcelę umiera na niej.
description.romanian: Watch as a Tiny who is visiting your home lot dies on it.
description.schinese: 目睹小微在你家当场去世。
description.spanish: Observa cómo un Tiny que está de visita en tu terreno muere en él.
description.tchinese: Watch as a Tiny who is visiting your home lot dies on it.
description.turkish: Evini ziyaret eden bir Tiny´in öldüğüne şahit ol.

displayName.brazilian: RIP pra mim, Eu morri estanto morto

description.brazilian: Faça com que um dos seus pequeninos morra em um terreno público.

description.german: Sieh zu, wie eine:r von deinen eigenen Tinys auf einem öffentlichen Grundstück stirbt.
description.italian: Fai morire un* dei/delle tuoi/tue Tinies su un lotto pubblico.
description.japanese: 公共の区画でタイニーを1人死なせる
description.polish: Niech jeden z twoich Tinych umrze na parceli publicznej.
description.romanian: Have one of your Tinies die on a public lot.
description.schinese: 有小微死在了公共场所。
description.spanish: Que uno de tus Tinies muera en un solar público.
description.turkish: Tiny'lerinden birisinin halka açık arsada ölmesini sağla.

description.brazilian: Tenha um pequenino que tenha progredido em todas as habilidades.
description.czech: Tvůj Tiny ovládá základy všech dovedností.
description.dutch: Heb een Tiny die vooruitgang heeft gemaakt in elke vaardigheid.
description.english: Have a Tiny who has made progress in every single skill.
description.french: Ayez un·e Tiny qui a progressé dans chaque compétence.
description.german: Habe eine:n Tiny, der/die in jeder Fähigkeit mindestens Level 1 erreicht hat.
description.italian: Fai che un* tuo/tua Tiny faccia progressi in ogni singola abilità.
description.japanese: すべてのスキルを上達する
description.polish: Posiadaj Tiny'ego, który ma doświadczenie w każdej z umiejętności.
description.romanian: Have a Tiny who has made progress in every single skill.
description.schinese: 单个小微升级了每一项技能。
description.spanish: Ten un Tiny que haya hecho progreso en todas las habilidades.
description.turkish: Her yeteneği geliştirmiş bir Tiny'n olsun.

description.japanese: すべてのスキルを最大レベルまで上達する

description.schinese: 单个小微所有技能均达到满级。
